record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.topic: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the consideration of S. 1704, which was introduced earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will state the bill by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.topic: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time, passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.topic: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, what is the pending business?

record.chair: The Senator from Alabama is recognized under the previous unanimous consent agreement until the time of 2:30 p.m. for the purpose of debate only.
